item.title: About
item.description: Website Theme & Content I’ve designed the theme as well as the content. All of it. I once saw this theme on someone’s website. Then i forgot it ðŸ™„. So, being the person I am, I kind of tried to remake it. This site is generated by hugo. I’m still making it, so don’t criticise me just yet. Fonts The main font is Inter The font used in the footer is Space Mono The font for the dates is JetBrains Mono
